location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File No. B/5 V. O. Miscellaneous Correspondence with the Sultan of Muscat.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains two letters from the Political Agent, Bahrain, (Geoffrey Prior) to the Sultan of Muscat and Oman (Sa‘id bin Taymur al-Bu Sa‘idi). The first letter is to congratulate the Sultan on his accession to the throne, and the second is to inform him about the handing over of the Political Agency, Bahrain to Percy Gordon Loch.

name.namePart: Sultan of Muscat and Oman, Āl Bū Sa'īd Dynasty
